column4: hi, i want to download ubuntu 9, is there a download link for that?
ubuntu.com
i'm only to able to find ubuntu 10, not 9
ah.. why 9? 9.10 is end of life 18 months from Oct 2009
i cannot connect to the internet, listen to music, or even shut down the computer when using ubuntu 10
end of life?
better to find out why.. perhaps is an ACPI issue.. music? mp3's?  you have to install the codec for that.. end of life means the version will no longer be supported
i'm thinking it's the kernel, it happened with all distros that used that kernel
i'm not good with linux
i can't even install anything without the internet connection
It really sounds like you have several issues going on.. internet is one.. with that you can do a full upgrade.  I believe there is a new kernel or updates to the existing one.. are you wireless?
yes
i'm using a different distribution... i have 10.04 on another cd but i'm planning on erasing it and put 9 inside

wireless can be an issue.. if you want to attempt to connect with it again.. make sure your router is broadcasting the ssid and has all encryption (wep, wpa, etc) turned off.. once it's connected then tweek
!unrar > Fudge
i've done that before, able to connect for a few seconds with 4220b/s download

do you have the ability to plug the computer directly into the internet via a wire?  you can do that and do the updates.. then try again.. sometimes network-manager is just interfearing and might work with wicd instead.
no, not really
you didn't install the server version did you?
no, i know what i downloaded
just asking.. you might be able to get the 9.10 version by using torrents..
http://ubuntu.media.mit.edu/ubuntu-releases/9.10/
thanks scunizi
good luck
